subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Drivers in Sunday’s Nascar Sprint Cup race at Talladega will be fiddling with their radios, not for music, but to talk to their competitors to find a drafting partner.
snippet: Drivers in Sunday’s Nascar Sprint Cup race at Talladega will be fiddling with their radios, not for music, but to talk to their competitors to find a drafting partner.
